sentences.sContent: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.sCn: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.sContent: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
‘So Bill’s leaving her?’ ‘ So it seems (= that seems to be true ) .’
sentences.sCn: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

phrases.pCn: 看起来像；看上去像…；好像…

trans.tranOther: if something seems to be true, there are qualities or facts that make people think it is true
